name: OG Seven Deadly Sins
description:
This game was the OG idea for my senior project; intended to be a web project, I realized that I wouldn't be able to get it to the web in the time I had.  There are still some issues with the piece;  only three worlds are accessible,  the solar system angle is difficult to maneuver, and it is overall bare bones. However if you still want to see it and to however clicks on the sun(iykyk) it's here if you want to play, view, or interact with it 😊.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D is used in the planets and on the hangar
  • The arrow keys are used in the solar system. 

Things to know:

  • The audio may be loud so be cautious.
